text: I was rear-ended on my bike by another bicyclist on naito this afternoon. He was following too close and I stopped for pedestrians and he crashed into me and we both fell off. I was lucky to land on my butt and my bike seems ok, although I think the front wheel may be slightly bent :disappointed_relieved: oh well at least everyone is ok. No raccoons sighted.

urggh, sorry to hear that - glad you are OK. did the other cyclist take off? he/she is responsible for your damaged front wheel ;(  itâ€™s unusual to rear end someone, typically the ones that follow another bike in a short distance know what they are doing ...
